website_summaries.verdict: With its amazing antimicrobial properties and mid-range price, this spacious, sturdy cutting board is worth considering.
pros: A large, thick board made of eco-friendly organic bamboo
Earns praise from happy customers who love its good looks

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last 6 months but the lifetime warentee and customer service is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Product is just over 3 months old. Never been in the dishwasher and has developed a crack. The crack is all the way through and will now leak on my counter. I feel we spent too much for something that didnt last 6 months. However after contacting the seller we were informed it has a lifetime warentee and a replacement is on it's way! What great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: David Bender

customer_reviews.title: I have had the board for 6 months now.
customer_reviews.text: I have waited to write a review so I could use the board over a period of time. I am very pleased with the performance and how it has held up. All types of food products. I have included a picture showing it today after almost daily use for 6 months. For me, it is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my new cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I love this board. It is a nice size so it can be used for more than 1 item. I love that it has an area around the edging to catch liquid and prevent a mess. I found this easy to clean, and easy to apply oil too. The board is attractive looking. Could easily be displayed. Best of all I am very concerned about having safe products in my home, and this filled that priority for me, too. Nothing bad to say about this great product.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying it. It was very easy to clean. I don't mind handwashing it. The last bamboo cutting board (not from this vendor) I put in the dishwasher. It didn't stay as beautiful as when I first bought it. I'm treating this one nicer. So that it will look as good as now longer. I love the bamboo cutting board! Not much more I can say than that it is a good cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: SMPath

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board works great! I have been looking for a good cutting board for a while. At first i wasn't sure if i should go for it or not because i have had bad experience with cutting board with a bunch of wooden pieces put together. I have used this for about a month now and i haven't had any problem so far. The only thing I have to be careful about is that once i start cutting, sometimes the cutting board slides, so a thin rubber padding at the edges would be great to keep in place. Other that that, no problem so far and i would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran Chaluvaraju

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I sent this order to my daughter. When she received it she was quite impressed! She was surprised at the size! She highly recommends it!
customer_reviews.author: sagittaloha

customer_reviews.title: VERY SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the size. It fits very well over my stainless kitchen sink. Makes cleaning fish, chopping meat and veggies clean and simple. One thing though. This board, like all wooden cutting boards, must be treated with a food grade mineral oil in order to keep it from absorbing odors.
customer_reviews.author: EDinWAState

customer_reviews.title: Even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I am really loving this cutting board. I seasoned it with mineral oil for several days. Easy clean up. In fact, this is the ONLY thing in my kitchen that I don't mind washing by hand! It sits flat on my countertop. I do not miss the thin plastic, nor the thick plastic, cutting boards I've used in the past. I went to Amazon intending to buy thin plastic cutting boards but ended up buying this one based on reviews and I'm so glad I did! I'm hooked on these now!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our charcuterie boards
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased about a dozen and a half of these and are in love with them. We use them for large charcuterie boards in our winery. They're perfect! And we love that they're guaranteed.
customer_reviews.author: H Price

customer_reviews.title: I love these - have 3!
customer_reviews.text: All the durability of wood yet 1/8 of the cost and wash up like a dream. At such a low cost you can have as many as you need for different purposes and they make a great 'serving board' for 2 people when you just want to 'snack by the TV' or take a picnic and have a 'flat surface' to set your drinks on (assuming you're using the picnic blanket and enjoying the slope of a beautiful mountainside).
customer_reviews.author: Diane Ticks!

customer_reviews.title: It’s a shame because I loved this thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not even a month ago and it broke already....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: *Warning* Do not buy unless you don't mind eating bamboo.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it and washed it two times, but every time I wash it the surface is covered with little bamboo splinters. I had a bamboo cutting board for many years before buying this one, so this isn't user error, it's just low quality manufacturing. My fault for not looking at the reviews and assuming that a cutting board of all things would be strong enough to hold up to a light scrub with a sponge.
customer_reviews.author: M. VanNatta

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and wanted to use it for a while before posting my review. When I purchased the board I needed to prep the board before using. I put coconut oil on it each day, for one week. Don't forget to do this step! If you don't, then the board will be dry and the bamboo fibers will stick up. Then I started using it. When it looks a little dry, I simply apply more coconut oil and it's good to go. I just love this board! A little prep goes a long way to insure a long lasting product.
customer_reviews.author: HomeschoolMom

customer_reviews.title: Love my new cutting board
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful cutting board. I have been oiling it with the walnut oil for the past 5 days now and everyday it gets more beautiful. I don’t even want to use it but that is not why I bought it. I’ve used it a few times it stays in place, very sturdy I live the two tone bamboo the only thing I’m not to sure on is how to season it but I guess that’s not important for me. I love how there is a lifetime replacement warranty on the board.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this board in February of this year and it already has a major crack across it. It's only been four months and I have treating it a butcher block conditioner from the get go. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: Update: Company owner reached out and not only replaced the damaged cutting board but refunded our original order as well. She is also sending some oil spray to use on our new board. Hoping the new board will last longer than the first but I am very confident in this company based on their customer service. We liked this product for the first few weeks, after spending about 10 days oiling it up before we could even use it. But after washing it a few times the sides came away from the board making it unusable for cutting. The board does not lay flat on the counter and is incredibly noisy when used to chop.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: SPLIT APART
customer_reviews.text: CRAP! When I got it, the board was flat. Within a week it was bowed. Then one of the lighter end pieces split from the center section. It gets very very dry and oiling it was a pain and also didn't make much of a difference. Now, the option to return it is off the table apparently! Now I have a useless piece of bamboo. UPDATE: The seller got back to me immediately and is sending me a new board. Very good customer service, so I will give it another try!
customer_reviews.author: LEENER126300

customer_reviews.title: Wood slivers + food = yum!
customer_reviews.text: The first board I received had wood slivers all over it, after a thorough cleaning, manual removal of most of the slivers and a proper oiling it was still generating slivers after use. I thought this was just a defective board and decided to get a replacement. Once received I realized that the second board was the same as the first. POOR quality! If you like adding bamboo pieces to you food for extra flavor this is the board for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: The splintering is awful!
customer_reviews.text: I hate to post a bad review, but this cutting board is absolute garbage. It gives off splinters like crazy. I tried oiling it, washing it only by hand, scrubbing it, etc. The splinters continued to be a problem and didn’t improve at all. There is NO WAY I will prepare food on this!! I have had a number of bamboo boards and utensils over the years and have never seen anything like this. I am returning it and will buy a different board elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY NOT SO GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE SIZE AND STYLE OF THIS CUTTING BOARD, HOWEVER. THE FINISH IS NOT GOOD. IF YOU RUN YOUR FINGERS ON THE BOARD IT'S ONLY SMOOTH GOING ONE WAY. WHEN YOU RUN YOUR FINGERS GOING THE OTHER WAY, IT'S ROUGH AND FEELS LIKE TINY PIECES OF WOOD WILL END UP IN YOUR FOOD. I HAVE 4 OTHER BAMBOO CUTTING BOARD AND THEY DO NOT FEEL LIKE THIS ONE. WILL TRY SCRUBBING IT WITH A SCOURING PAD TO SEE IF I CAN SMOOTH OUT THE ROUGHNESS BEFORE I USE IT. UPDATE: CHANGED MY RATING FROM 3 TO 5 STARS. SELLER SENT A REPLACEMENT AND IT IS GREAT! EXCEPTIONAL CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: D. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cutting board as a gift for my husband who has been looking for a larger bamboo board for a while. The size is great but that's about it. He oiled it as required but it has little splinters all over and even though he used it only a few times it now also has a crack. The board doesn't lie flat and is just overall a disappointment. You get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this cutting board. It's sturdy and the design with the groove is great at catching spill-off. I love that it's bamboo. I have looked around for one of these for a while but for this price I wouldn't have found this quality. No way. I'm thankful to Natalie at TastesLovely, for recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: iLuvCupcakes

customer_reviews.title: Sheds wood particles non stop, no way I'm cutting food on this!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in cutting board. The board shed small thin wood particles non stop, even after washing. It always had that "furry" feel. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: A year later and I'm still happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this board over a year ago (May 2016) and it has proven itself to be a good purchase. As with everything else, and most especially any wood product, proper maintenance is a crucial part of ownership. To extend the board's longevity and help prevent splitting, it is absolutely essential that you regularly apply a generous coating of food grade mineral oil. I have chosen to use Boos Block Mystery Oil and it has served this purpose exceptionally well. My recommendation would be to buy this cutting board if you prefer a large one with some extra space for your food preparation tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Add oil for the love of God add oil
customer_reviews.text: Add oil on board nothing fancy, mineral oil, wax food grade,flaxseed oil, coconut oil, olive oil,etc. Treat it like you treat your cast iron pans. Same concept u can heat your oil and apply. Other then that I'll see how long it last. It does flake or splinter when washing it dry with soap but it not dangers adding oil fellowing the grain stops that.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory.B

customer_reviews.title: Solid! Good for any cook!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent size for the home cook, solidly made and feels heavy. I've been using it for a little over a month now almost every day and it's holding up great. Just wash in the sink with dish washing liquid, drain off the excess water and let air dry before rubbing down the cutting surface with olive oil. If you don't oil this cutting board I'd imagine it would start to crack or splinter since it is a plant based product. Even with a very sharp knife it's hard to cut into this board unless you drag the tip of the blade. Will definitely buy another one when this one gets old!
customer_reviews.author: C944

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been doing research on bamboo cutting boards and finally ordered 2 of these medium size boards because of the lifetime warranty. I conditioned the boards with mineral oil right away, washed and dried them, and used it twice today already. So amazing. Night and day difference, I could tell with my knife immediately. Boards are beautiful, high quality, sturdy, perfect thickness and weight, anything bigger or heavier wouldn’t be functional for everyday use. Love these so far and I’m really hoping with proper care, they will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with this cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Before the situation we are currently all in, I was not much for cooking. That has changed. I am cooking more than I ever have and decided to purchase this board and I must say I feel like a chef now. LOL. As many of us have found new interests and habits while at home, I've decided to start cooking more so this cutting board made sense. It is sturdy, the perfect size for my smallish kitchen and is made from organic wood. I'm so happy with it and I've been using it daily since I unwrapped it. As a side note, I also purchased oil to keep it from drying out.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaT

customer_reviews.title: Updated review: seller was great about replacing the board
customer_reviews.text: We like the size and features of this cutting board (juice channel) and it's inexpensive compared to many other boards, but the board cracked right in the middle after about a month of regular use, so now anytime we're cutting something with liquid content, it leaks right through the board. Also the wood has small splinters that come off of it - not sure if that's a manufacturing issue or due to the bamboo material. Next time we're going with something else. UPDATE: we contacted the seller and they were great to deal with and replaced the board. Great customer service. Not convinced this is the best board, but it's inexpensive, and the seller was wonderful to work with!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Wang

customer_reviews.title: Good chopping board, cant keep it clean
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, size, and shape of this board. Shipping was fast. However, after having it only about 2 months, mold (or something) has started accumulating around the edges. I wash this board by hand and place it in a drying rack. Blackness has started appearing on the edges (not on the cutting surface yet) that I cannot seem to scrub off. Is this mold? Mildew? I'm not sure, but I always towel dry then air dry the cutting board. If it gets any worse I might seek a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron R.

customer_reviews.title: Third Time was Not a Charm
customer_reviews.text: I really want this board at first. A friend and their sister both have and like this board. I did not have the same experience. The first one ordered was lost in transit. The second board arrived with a big long scratch/gouge and when trying to replace it, it was going to be over a month to receive a new one so I cancelled. I reconsidered and tried one last time and the board that arrived had a long scratch and several dents on the surface. Quality control and quality of the product was not impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!!  Poorly made, will split down entire length even with minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: Had this beautiful cutting board just over a year, only using it occasionally. Bought the special cutting board oil to be sure to treat it well. Last week I took it out of the rack to use and there was a huge split down the board along one of the seams. GRR! Of course I can’t use it because it would be unsanitary and now too late to be able to return it. Have three other sized cutting boards from other manufacturers and not one of those have ever split.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great Bamboo Cutting Board for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I'll cut straight to my complaints: 1. The lowered portion shortly to the edge of the board tends to accumulate food particles and makes it more difficult to clean. 2. Due to the porous nature of the wood, more watery food items leave residue that absorb and are difficult to scrub out. 3. Can chip and splinter if dropped. Overall pleased with my purchase. I wanted a wooden cutting board at a fraction of the cost and I got it.
customer_reviews.author: D T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but thin
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is nicely made and a good size. I was disappointed by the groove for liquid though, because it is so small it holds almost nothing. I got this in hopes of cutting something like a roast, or a turkey, or a ham, but honestly even just placing the item to be cut on this board overflows the juice groove. Its really just a big vegetable board.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: One received not darker rich looking brown as described or photos show
customer_reviews.text: Received Bamboo cutting board today. Purchased based on rich dark brown main cutting area. One received is bare wood on ends and main board is slightly darker. Much lighter than the "before oiling" photos. After looking at the item photo gallery, I see some buyers received the darker as advertised and others the unattractive very light version, as I received. Contacted seller requesting to receive one matching photos and description. Will update review depending on outcome. In the meanwhile, not removing items protective plastic outer packaging. I know that mineral oil will darken the wood but one received much lighter and will never darken as item indicates.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly BearTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: There are many things to like about this
customer_reviews.text: This may sound a little bit odd but I love this size cutting board for many reasons. For a single person because the smaller Mills I need a cutting board it’s too late my life. This is perfect for carving steaks or a small roast and for prepping other kinds of meat. The other thing I really like about this is that it makes a great lap board for a sandwich or your morning coffee and some toast.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Return! Bamboo hairs after wash!
customer_reviews.text: I literally unpackaged, washed with soapy warm water as suggested & got all these bamboo "hairs", I'll call them, all over the board. I thought hey, maybe I didn't clean enough, let's clean it again. Even more hairs coming up after 2nd wash. I will not be cutting anything on this. I can't imagine it taking a knive very well. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: So many splinters
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this board a few days owing to the fantastic reviews I saw, and I’m seriously disappointed. Upon unpackaging it I ran my hand over the board only to be pricked by one of the hundreds of splinters on it. (See picture) Seriously disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Séamus Ó Fuada

customer_reviews.title: Cutting board light as a feather
customer_reviews.text: Background: The previous cutting board that I purchased in 1971 weighed in at 8.5 pounds. I suffer from rotator cuff tears on both shoulders. I use my 1971 cutting board 4 times a day at a minimum. I do a lot of cooking as a caregiver 24/7. This use of that heavy board added to the pain in my shoulders. Not good. So I purchased this cutting board. Yes, it is easy to clean. Yes, the knives do not leave a mark on the bamboo, so far. Yes, it is sturdily made. But best of all, the board is light.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Batton

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Doesn't seem to stain (I use a lot of dark soy sauces). Sturdy, light, easy to clean. It is big. I like the looks as well. 100% better than any plastic cutting board without all the complication and expense of a thick, heavy wood one. I don't need a cutting board to last for generations. I think this one will last for years and when I need to I can replace it, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. O'krongly

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service - and really good cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because we needed to change from our old plastic board, and liked the look, reviews, back-story and size of this one. Within two weeks, the board developed a warp - but the company immediately sent a replacement. We've had that one in use without a problem for several months and love it. Great service. Suggestion: be sure to condition the board properly, both before use, and every several weeks after.
customer_reviews.author: BrianC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I had some cheap bamboo boards which started to crack and one broke in half, so I decided to do some research and find a good board that will last a long time. I found this board had great reviews, so I ordered it. I absolutely love it! It's very solid feeling and the wood is beautiful. I put cutting board oil and wax on it to prevent drying, and it looks absolutely beautiful! I am very excited to have a nice cutting board finally, and I hope it lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting board, even better customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this board from the first time I used it, it's a great size + weight and easy on your knives. BUT EVEN BETTER - they really stand behind their LIFETIME warranty. I know this because after purchasing my original board in June 2017, it developed a crack last month. I messaged them thru Amazon explaining my issue, sent them my order number and a couple of phone pics - and a week later I had a brand new cutting board, no questions asked! Do your self a favor - support this quality product and the people who stand behind it, you won't regret it -
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and shape
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Perfect size and shape, appears to be well made, very stylish, has a juice groove close to the edge (it annoys me when the groove is too far toward the center because then you're restricted to a tiny area in the middle). Cons: There were some splintery fibers at first, but after scrubbing it under hot water with an abrasive sponge and then oiling it with mineral oil, it's smoothed out. I suspect this is going to be a common thing with most bamboo boards since bamboo is inherently composed of long, straight fibers. Make sure to season it with mineral oil (or other oil that doesn't go rancid) according to the manufacturer's directions.
customer_reviews.author: Emissary

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and this had the best rating. So, I purchased for my daughter-in-law for Christmas. I pointed out that it clearly said on the label to wash by hand and not put in the dishwasher. Apparently she has ruined others she had had by putting them in the dishwasher. She seemed happy with my purchase so quite honestly, I don't know that it is easy to clean as I don't have it, she does.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Loch

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It is very nice looking, however, I seasoned the cutting board with olive oil as instructed and it seemed to work initially to prevent fibers from coming out of the wood. After a week, the fibers from the wood kept coming out oh, and I had to stop using it as I was concerned I would ingest them. Unfortunately, this was a disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Went to pick up greenie board and and the end of the chopping board fell off!!! Nothing on board either!! Also last week we put seasoning on chicken an BBQ it. Cut chicken on greenie bamboo board and now can’t get rid of seasoning odor. I have tried everything to clean noard BBQ odor STILL lingers.!!!
customer_reviews.author: gn

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality
customer_reviews.text: The Title says: Greener Chef Extra Large Bamboo Cutting Board - Lifetime Replacement Cutting Boards for Kitchen. When I see "Lifetime Replacement", I thought it got to be a good quality. However, after 1-2 month of use, it started to discolor and pieces were separating (see photo). I wash-clean and paper-dry it almost after each use so I think I gave it very reasonable care. I didn't save the original packing material or user manual, so don't know where to get it replaced, other than leaving a review here.
customer_reviews.author: WZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when you just have a few tomatoes, or an onion or 2 to chop.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small countertop and rarely need more than a small cutting board. This has perfectly fit my needs. I treated it with cutting board butter when it first arrived, and let it sit a day or two. Now, I either quickly wash it and let it air dry, or I just wipe it down with vinegar and let it dry. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: SueLars

customer_reviews.title: 2 onions = very deep cuts in the board. Facebook required to get replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I cut 2 onions and the board shows the cuts and they are significant. It was 2 onions, nothing extremely hard. Cannot imagine what would happen if I cut a squash on this board. It doesn't seem to be very hard given it is bamboo. This isn't any better than my previous cutting board. For me, it is not worth the money. So, I will look elsewhere. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Tar Heel

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice board and plenty big. I chopped up all the veggies for fajitas at one time and didn't mess up the table at all. I bought food grade mineral oil and treated it twice before use then treated it twice after washing and it's just a beautiful well made bamboo board that I'm proud to show off and it should last the rest of my life. My daughter will snatch this up after I pass on, I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: Mold developed on board. Gross.
customer_reviews.text: This is very disappointing. I am very particular about not allowing moisture under my board and even keep it on a tea towel and switch it out regularly. I noticed a strange smell and saw this happened. It’s smells like glue. Has anyone else had this problem with this board? I’ve never had a cutting board go moldy on me. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mo Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Needs some TLC
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers experienced, after the first wash there were tiny slivers all over the board making it unusable. I lightly sanded it and rubbed mineral oil over it a few times and now it’s as good as new (actually better). If you’re not willing/able to put in that effort then I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rae

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly pretty happy with this purchase. I use it nearly every other day for cutting veggies and I am very pleased with both the size and durability thus far. However, I would like to add that I wish that it marks from cutting didn't appear so rapidly. I KNOW it's a cutting board, but all the cutting boards I/my family have had have not featured such wear & tear so quickly (one of those boards is older than me!). Still a good board though and I will definitely be keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is GORGEOUS. Seems very well made. Not too heavy but you can definitely tell it's sturdy. I'll update my review as it's used if there's anything that comes up, but I have a feeling that with regular care/seasoning... This is going to be one of those products that has a long life in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Facetious_Elise

customer_reviews.title: Nice but split on the end
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is eco-friendly but I am not happy with the splitting on the end as shown in the picture. I used the Walnut Oil from this company every day for five days before I even used the board. I did not soak the board in water just cleaned with mild soap and water and dried then once completely dry I treated it with the oil. on both sides and the ends. After two uses the end started to split.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at the quality of this cutting board for the cost. It is easy to clean and manage. I cannot tell the difference between cutting on this board and a $100 board. I think it looks great, though will concede that style and finish are personal preferences.
customer_reviews.author: JWylie

customer_reviews.title: Splintered after 1 wash
customer_reviews.text: Cutting board is okay I guess. I literally washed it when it arrived & it started to splinter. It has cutting marks through the wood already & I’ve only had it 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Cpetts

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bamboo cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bamboo cutting board for a family member and they love it. It’s well-made, organic, and features the indented outer edges so fruit juice or other liquids don’t spill over the cutting board when cutting things. Great value and I’m confident it will last us many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Treat it well, and you will be treated well
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is amazing. This is actually my second, the first one my fiance bought a few years back. We still have the first one but when I got a new job in a different city, this was one of the must have kitchen pieces. When you take care of the cutting board properly, it will treat you well for years to come. Never wash it in the dishwasher, apply cutting board oil as necessary when it seems to be "dried out" and you're all set. This is a gift from above.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M

customer_reviews.title: Great board!
customer_reviews.text: Received the board and used it tonight to prep dinner. The board came exactly as described. The board was smooth and looked great. It didn't slide around on the cpunter as I chopped like others have, which makes life so much harder. So, I was happy about that. I was afraid that since there was no finish on it (which was why I bought it.) that it would stain since I was chopping red cabbage on it. But, nope! It did not stain and still looked great after it's first use. Highly recommend this board, and I will probably buy another one to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Navy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Very large surface, light and easy to pick up. Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is sooo nice and sturdy for the price. I bought this to gift to my mother for her birthday but now I may have to buy one for me too! It is large but it isn’t very heavy which is perfect. I have a large heavy one that I barely use because it’s so awkward to try to get it into the sink to wash after. This one checks all the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: VV RN

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice cutting board. I am not using it for food but I hot glue it to the top of a 16” trifold bookcase so I would have a larger flat surface on top to set items too large for the shelf itself. It works great and the cutting board looks as though it was made just for this bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: this has a lifetime replacement and it shows good craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has the little trough to catch juices when you're cutting because I use it for cutting up fruit. I also oiled it for several days as suggested. The ends are reinforced which makes me think it will last a long time without splitting, which is a problem I've always encountered with other bamboo boards. Overall very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Well made, not too heavy and cleans easily!
customer_reviews.text: My first bamboo cutting board arrived with a crack in it, but I contacted Greener Chef and they immediately sent me a new one! Their service is amazing. I love that the board isn’t too heavy and it’s very easy to wipe down. I keep my board out all the time because we are a family of 5 and always using it so I’m glad it’s so nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: S. Wirth

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I just love it. I see in other reviews people talk ...
customer_reviews.text: No one paid me or gave me this product. I bought this for myself. My husband and I just love it. I see in other reviews people talk about the label leaving color on the board. They have fixed that problem. My cutting board came in perfect shape. It washed well & is staying so smooth. We use it to do almost all of our kitchen prep. Even rolling out dough. The dough doesn't stick resulting in using less throw flour. I would recommend this to anyone, from a novice cook to a home chef. Worth the money. And shipping was very fast. We are very satisfied & would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Cook

customer_reviews.title: Board arrived unusable
customer_reviews.text: Although the product looks great initially. We found a ton of splinters and wood chips that made the board unusable. Tried to sand it down using fine grain sandpaper but that didn't help. Will be looking to return/exchange in the hopes that it's a defect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Splinters coming off
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I wanted to wash it before i start using it, n it start shedding its splinter after first wash. I bought this product because they claim lifetime warranty, now I don’t even know how to contact the company!
customer_reviews.author: Sanbaz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, surprisingly sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to buy this cutting board because of the price - I wanted something solid that would last, but had a small budget. I am so happy to report that this lightweight cutting board is surprisingly sturdy and has held up over several months now. It is barely showing any wear, and is used daily to chop vegetables. I think the quality and price are excellent, easy to clean, no splinters yet, and looks great. It looks just like the picture, with a little groove going all the way around the board. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Tons of splintering
customer_reviews.text: I took it out of the packaging to wash it and could immediately feel tons of splintering throughout the whole top of the cutting board with my hand. I washed it several times as directed and it was still shaving off. Reminds me of a pair of super cheap throwaway chopsticks. It’s such a shame because it’s aesthetically beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Kaanro

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with life time warranty
customer_reviews.text: I need big size organic chopping board for my heavy-duty daily cooking. Those board which you buy from Walmart does not last long. Decided to give a try with this board through Amazon; though it is a little over priced however the product has life time warranty. So far the product has been lasting well but I gave 4 star for the sturdiness because I need to try it for few more months to give a 5 star feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Generousbee

customer_reviews.title: Great customer  service
customer_reviews.text: I have to be honest had this board for a month and it split on the end where handle meets board .I contacted seller because guaranteed for life Quick response from seller and a new board within a week.Hope it was just a fluke and this one lasts alot longer
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did we wait so long
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is so nice it puts all our cutting boards to shame. Why we waited so long to get this is sad. Upgrade today and throw away the old plastic ones. This is beautiful, a perfect size and I love the edges for catching any juices that may sneak to the sides. It’s a great cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: T. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I used once an nice. thanks. hope it holds up. my last one split where all the wood was glued to make 1 big piece of wood. this board has got a life time warranty so if it breaks I get it replaced free I think. I paid more to get warranty. I dont want to have to buy another cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: wayne smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice large cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Good size board, very solid without being overly heavy. I bought the board as I didnt have a board large enough to cut a whole brisket. This is just large enough to fit about a 14 lb brisket. Also fits a frozen pizza nicely. The board also looks nice enough to use to serve food off on, I recently cut fruit on it and just left the fruit in the board for people to serve themselves. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cantdunk

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonably priced cutting board, it actually works really well to my surprise and I use it double sided, one for veggies and one for meat, but obviously you must clean it. It’s very lightweight and big enough to fit large cuts of meat.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cutting board
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bamboo cutting board, I’ve had those synthetic ones over the years not realizing they would trap bacteria like they do...so far I’ve only used it to cut a few things on but it’s awesome! Put some of the greener chef walnut spray on there and it looks just like the picture on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Fandrich

customer_reviews.title: Great price great board
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with these - I bought two to finally get rid of the plastic pieces I’ve been using for years. I oiled them up for a few days and only hand wash. They look great and it’s nice using it to serve on. Great or price too
customer_reviews.author: chamber

customer_reviews.title: a lot of splinters right out of the package
customer_reviews.text: The surface is full of small bamboo splinters. If I use the board, sooner or later those splinters may be gone, but will be mixed in my food. I owned bamboo cutting board before, it had no splinters, so I know it's the problem with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cutting and serving.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cutting board! Huge size. Perfect for cutting and serving.
customer_reviews.author: Lana White

customer_reviews.title: I want to gift this so other people can get the great experience I got!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant when I order this because I didn’t know if I would rather use it seeing as how it’s extra large, but it’s actually the opposite are use this board for everything it’s extremely easy to clean the size is perfect the ridges make everything a lot easier I don’t have juices going all over the place. I would definitely buy this as a gift for somebody because I feel like other people need to experience this. Five out of five stars I love it
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy and good looking cutting board. We love that it's bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Kskorman

customer_reviews.title: What a monster.
customer_reviews.text: This board is huge. Gives you all sort of working room. Nice ends hopefully will prevent the usual ends warping issues. It's heavy. It's a little hard to maneuver into the sink to rinse off, but it's a trade off I'll take.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting board!
customer_reviews.text: We went through quite a few cutting boards over the past few years. This one is great quality and is so easy to clean. Some of our others boards would start to bow up after a few months. This one still lays flat.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: False photo
customer_reviews.text: I like this cutting board a lot. But I don't like is the company's photo rendering in the ad. I believe they purposely made the middle of it darker, which can be achieved by adding oil but I shouldn't have to do anything to achieve the color as advertised. I would give more stars except for the fact they make it look prettier than it is and I don't like being lied to, shame on them God bless America a con artists dream
customer_reviews.author: Rick Parker

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite cutting board.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I cook! The ridges in the sides stop the juices from getting everywhere. It’s super easy to clean if you do it right away. I once let it sit overnight with a tomato slice on it and it left a round red stain. Totally my bad though!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and beautifully crafted!
customer_reviews.text: This board is a quality addtion to any kitchen. The board is made of high quality bamboo and the craftsmanship is outstanding. Following the recommended oil seasoning process is the key to making it a lasting investment, as is true for any cutting board. This board is replacing a 20 year old acacia board (still usable, but very worn). The only problem I have had so far, is the wife. She doesn't want to use it she wants to display it as a decorative piece because it is truly good looking. I'll probably need to buy another. Outstanding quality and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: TN_Papa

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I don't get why some people say there is a smell - as there was no smell at all. It is a bit hard to clean due to the material but overall I think it's pretty sturdy and easy to use. Has a chic look and definitely looks great in my kitchen!!! Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Bolor

customer_reviews.title: Nice cutting board
customer_reviews.text: The two-tone color effect is not as dramatic in reality as the picture shows. The center section of the board is only slightly more brown as compared to the beige ends but that was really no big deal. Maybe the color difference becomes more distinct with the use of conditioning oil. The board itself is as expected. Smooth, well-crafted, durable and works great. I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 years
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board lasted about 3 years with occasional use. It has multiple lengthwise splits now and I should stop using it. I'm. Ot sure if this is typical of bamboo boards. I liked the large size and picked this one after research regarding glues used etc. I might buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Rock

customer_reviews.title: Saves my expensive knives
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this a good looking board, it is kind to my knives. When I cut something, there are no knife marks on the board. This indicates to me that the knife is not being dulled by cutting wood.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, sturdy, reasonable.
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived so I haven't used it much yet. But it's very nice looking, feels sturdy. The price was reasonable, only $20. My last cutting board lasted 20 yrs. It's still a bargain if this one only lasts half as long.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality and excellent customer service from the actual ...
customer_reviews.text: 3-4 weeks in and I am impressed. Good build quality and excellent customer service from the actual small business owners. I like that this is was made with organic bamboo and that the board didn't stink like some other bamboo boards I've purchased in the past. The board arrived without any cracks or chips. My family uses this board primarily for fruit and veggies and a slightly thicker board for meats (for segregation) although I am sure this board would stand up to meat carving as well. Would love to see a half sized board in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Gill Wong

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had much better bamboo cutting boards for cheaper. After washing and oiling thoroughly (daily for a week, as per the instructions) it still had way too many splinters of bamboo coming up. I eventually sanded it down in the hopes that would make it usable since I don’t care for uncooked bamboo bits in my food lol. Unfortunately it’s mediocre even after this, and I would be embarrassed to give this to anybody I didn’t hate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful board!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Greener Chef Bamboo cutting board. The wood is so beautiful that I can keep it on my counter. i purchased the bamboo oil with it, and I have been conditioning after each use. The grain is lovely. I love the cutting board so much I purchased a second one as it was a special offer with a knife. I would love to purchase a wooden chopping bowl from the same company. I would also consider giving the board as gifts. It is more than a cutting board. It is a work of art!
customer_reviews.author: shapcomp

customer_reviews.title: mean, green, cutting machine
customer_reviews.text: Okay, maybe it's not a cutting machine, but it is a great size for chopping salads using a curved chopping knife to prevent dulling the blade. It needs to be hand washed, of course. I wouldn't use it for raw meat. It is an attractive board and I love that it is made by a small company.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Owens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a family of 6
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this cutting board. The size is awesome. It’s used daily... I didn’t get the oil to keep the wood from dulling, but so far it’s good. I use it for everything except meat. Perfect size for my meal preps. I want another !!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is amazing! Beautiful quality and feels extremely well made. I like that it has a lip around the outside to keep juices from leaking on my countertop. The large size is an added bonus and allows me to cut multiple items at once.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Avoid cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: Its cheap and started to come apart after a few weeks. This is with washing and immediately drying.
customer_reviews.author: Eskrimador1

customer_reviews.title: SPLINTERS
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cutting board with the security of knowing it would be replaceable for life. When it arrived, there were splinters ALL OVER the cutting board. I tried to wash them off, but this only made it splinter even more. I figured it was maybe just a faulty one. So I requested a replacement. Unfortunately, the new one had the SAME issue. I returned for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Krause

product_meta.title: Greener Chef Extra Large Bamboo Cutting Board - Lifetime Replacement Cutting Boards for Kitchen - 18 x 12.5 Inch - Organic Wood Butcher Block and Wooden Carving Board for Meat and Chopping Vegetables
feature_bullets: GORGEOUS, SMART, LIFELONG SOLUTION - PUT YOUR FEARS to rest with the last cutting boards you’ll ever need. It won’t crack, separate, warp or split, guaranteed or we’ll replace it for LIFE! We’re that confident you’ll LOVE how it OUTPERFORMS every other wood cutting board.

MESS-ELIMINATING & “JUST THE RIGHT SIZE” - 18” x 12.5” Over the Sink Cutting Board let’s you PREP RIGHT OVER THE DISPOSAL, while OPTIMALLY THICK .7” depth that’s STRONG enough to hold large watermelons, yet THIN enough to SLIDE UPRIGHT INTO unused countertop crevices. Not too big. Not too tiny. Just right!

LOVE TO ENTERTAIN? CUT, FLIP, SERVE, SMILE :) ~ WOW YOUR GUESTS as you keep your countertop protected (and mess free!) SIDE 1 boasts a DEEP JUICE CATCHING GROOVE, ideal for capturing the goodness that goes into sauces, glazes, gravies and more ~ SIDE 2 creates a BEAUTIFUL PRESENTATION SPACE - large enough to lay out an entire turkey, cheese spread, or charcuterie platter.

FOOD GRADE - ULTRA SAFE - ORGANIC - NATURALLY ANTIMICROBIAL/BACTERIAL: 100% Moso Bamboo cutting board, grown in ORGANIC, TOXIN FREE TESTED SOIL, then meticulously tested at every phase to ensure it delivers both the DURABILITY and SAFETY your family deserves. Zero harmful chemicals, lacquers or toxic ANYTHING, guaranteed!

✅SUPER IMPORTANT✅ THIS PROTECTS YOUR PREMIUM KNIVES: Don’t invest $1000’s on Henckels, Sakai, Miyabi, Wusthof, G-48, Messermeister or MAC MTH-80 only to watch your cheaply made cutting boards nick their edges and bend their lines. GREENER CHEF BAMBOO is the TESTED CHAMPION of HOME CHEFS, boasting a surface with “Just Enough Give” to allow ample knife flexibility, without marrying up knives edges.
